official_title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the National Book Festival.

summary.text: Authorizes the Library of Congress, in cooperation with the First Lady, to sponsor a free public event, the National Book Festival on the Capitol grounds on September 8, 2001.

titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the National Book Festival.
